ygData.subject: Re: adding new profiles at build time
ygData.msgSnippet: After some testing I determined that conf/profiles is created lazily if either a new profile is created or if the default profile is edited in the web UI. To

After some testing I determined that conf/profiles is created lazily if eit=
her a new profile is created or if the default profile is edited in the web=
 UI.

To supply extra pre-defined crawl profiles to a production group with=
out altering the current build mechanism, I created a bash script to patch =
the distribution.


Paul


--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, "pbaclac=
e" <pbaclace@...> wrote:
>
> I would like to add some crawl profiles that w=
ould be available immediately after installing Heritrix without any additio=
nal steps by the person doing the install.
> 
> How are profiles added at b=
uild time for Heritrix1?  src/conf/profiles/default/ exists but is not pres=
ent in the downloadable distribution at sf.net (and neither is the conf/pro=
files/ directory created after expanding the dist).  
> 
> (Building with m=
aven1 produces a tar.gz that is also missing the conf/profiles/ directory.)=

> 
> Is conf/profiles/ and conf/profiles/default/ created lazily at runtim=
e? 
> 
> 
> Paul
>
